<task>
# Fix Firebase Configuration Inconsistencies

I need you to fix the inconsistencies in the Firebase configuration for the AI Sports Edge project. This is part of a larger workspace validation task.

## Context
- The project is located at: `/Users/lisadario/Desktop/ai-sports-edge`
- Previous verification found that:
  - Web configuration files (`src/config/firebase.ts` and `src/config/firebase.js`) correctly use `ai-sports-edge-final.appspot.com`
  - Native platform configurations (iOS and Android) and environment variables incorrectly use `ai-sports-edge.appspot.com`

## Your Task
1. Update the following files to use the correct Firebase project (`ai-sports-edge-final`):
   - iOS: `firebase-config/GoogleService-Info.plist`
   - Android: `firebase-config/google-services.json`
   - Environment variables: `.env.development` and `.env.production`
   
2. Ensure all references to the storage bucket are updated to `ai-sports-edge-final.appspot.com`

3. Verify that the changes are consistent across all configuration files

Please only perform the work outlined in these instructions and do not deviate. When complete, use the `attempt_completion` tool with a concise summary of your findings and changes in the `result` parameter. This summary will be used to track project completion.

These specific instructions supersede any conflicting general instructions you might have.
</task>

            updateProgress(implementationProgress);
